At Ambient Skies Productions, my responsibilities have really shifted towards Production Coordination and Business Growth in the last 2 years. My day to day also includes sound design, recording & mixing. However, I spend most of my time as a content producer & director for all of our clients. My colleagues, associates & clients can attest to my ability to juggle many task at any given time. I am passionate towards business and start ups, being a self made entrepreneur since 2006.

I hired Ambient Skies for a week long video shoot in a remote area in West Texas.  They sent a cameraman, Clint, who was well equipped with his own gear, ready to work in strange, difficult, and sometimes dangerous conditions. summary: Video producer - Sound Recordist - Graphic Designer - Business Owner - Gear head.My background is marketing, business development, audio engineering & graphic design. At Ambient Skies, I stick to daily business operations such as production coordination and working out marketing strategies with clients. However - I fill in as a sound recordist / mixer any chance I get. I have built / operated many  different recording studios and spend my free time as a mixing engineer in my home recording studio. I definitely like to stay busy, but my passion that continues to keep me motivated every morning is business. My entrepreneurial spirit combined with a DIY mentality, has recently lead me to the position of consulting many clients on all marketing efforts from video to print and web. In my free time I enjoy spending time with my family, mountain biking & traveling.
name: John Schaus
